meanings.definition: Resembling glass in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The ice on the pond was so glasslike, it looked like a mirror.
meanings.sent2: The window was so clean and glasslike that you could barely see it.
meanings.sent3: The glasslike ice cubes in my drink made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as glasslike as the calm surface of a lake.
meanings.sent5: The glasslike crystals sparkled in the sunlight, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of glass.
meanings.sent1: The fragile vase was so glasslike that it shattered with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a sculpture that was truly glasslike in its transparency.
meanings.sent3: The glasslike material of the phone case made it both sleek and delicate.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a glasslike quality, smooth and clear.
meanings.sent5: The glasslike structure of the building reflected the surrounding skyline.
